1. '''Launch the UNR OpenOffice.org using various input devices'''
** Click desktop icon using touch screen
** Click desktop icon using hardware trackball/joystick
** Click desktop icon using Bluetooth/USB mouse
** Launch browser from console command

1. '''Menus'''
** Menus should be consistent and obvious in layout
** All functions in the menus should work and be obvious to understand
** Tools icons should be obvious and easily understood
** Save and print in both toolbar and menu should function as expected

1. '''Differences in opening screens'''
** Writer should have a blank page with tool bars
** Calcs should be a blank grid with tool bars
** Base should fire up the database wizard
** Impress should fire up the Presentation wizard
** Draw should be a blank page with drawing tools

1. '''Look and feel'''
** All of the different sections should have a familiar look and feel to them
** All of the different sections toolbars should have some sense of consistency to them
** Fonts should be easily read and pleasing on the eye
